name: Margikarman ItoA
storyline: An RPG in which the hero who awakens in the world of the gap after dying due to some obsession goes back and forth between this world and the world in order to regain his lost memories and settle his thoughts.
summary: Ghosts who face their own death while going back and forth between the world of the dead and this world. A complete version of the ADV-type modern RPG "Margikarman" from the Eldritch and the School.
